name: The 2D Maze!
description:
WARNING! This game is not a virus! If you're PC says it's a virus, IT'S NOT!

This is a DEMO for the upcoming game "The 2D Maze!"

----------------------------------------Updates in future-------------------------------------

Version 1.0  Add 5 more levels, Spelled Verison to Version at the end of the game.

Version 1.1  Add 5 more levels, Add SFX and music to the game.

Version 1.2  Pressing ESC will quit the game.

Version 1.3  Add facial expressions to the player.

Version 1.4  Add customizable avatars, 10 more levels.
